item.title: Harry Scells
item.description:
I am an Assistant Professor at the University of TÃ¼bingen. My research focuses on information retrieval, including basic research into retrieval models, query processing, evaluation, and applications to health and medicine.

Previously, I was an Alexander von Humboldt research fellow in the Temir group at Leipzig University. Before that, I was a postdoctoral research fellow in the ielab group at The University of Queensland, where I also completed my PhD.

Please find a list of my publications on this page with links to relevant project pages. The most complete list of publications can be found on my Google Scholar profile.
